title: Location
text:
The apartment is well-connected and makes getting around Dresden very easy

â€¢ The other tram line leads straight to the IndustriegelÃ¤nde area â€“ home to many of Dresdenâ€™s techno clubs, bars, and alternative venues. Perfect if youâ€™re planning a night out or want to discover the cityâ€™s vibrant nightlife.
ğŸš‰ The Dresden-Neustadt train station is only about 5 minutes away and serves as a major hub. From there, you can catch:

Whether youâ€™re here to relax, explore, or dance the night away, the apartmentâ€™s location makes it easy to enjoy all sides of Dresden!

text: I am starting a list of locations for you to visit while in Dresden. I will focus on Neustadt, where all the cool bars, cafes and clubs are located.

title: Tour
text:
ğŸª´ Feel at Home
This is my home. Be my guest in my tiny flat decorated by me personal touches. Iâ€™ve designed it to be a calming place to unwind, recharge, or just enjoy a calm moment.
Youâ€™ll find some of my yoga and pilates equipment, which you are very welcome to use during your stay. If youâ€™re looking for a guided session you can use the Apple TV to find insprational videos. For a cozy night in, feel free to explore the streaming platforms available.
ğŸ“¶ Wi-Fi is fast and free throughout the apartment.

ğŸŒ¯ Food & convenience:
A mini-bar area with a fridge, coffee machine, water kettle, and basic utensils and cups is available to enjoy a quiet morning coffee or a small snack.
ğŸ´ The flat doesnâ€™t have a kitchen, youâ€™ll find everything you need for a simple breakfast or evening drink.
Thereâ€™s a small Imbiss offering takeaway meals, and a SpÃ¤tshop around the corner is open evenings till 1 am. There you can grab snacks, drinks, or anything you might have forgotten. Itâ€™s perfect for late arrivals or quick bites without going far.
Further recommendations for nearby shops, restaurants, bakeries, cafÃ©s you will find in the flat.
